title: India’s Economy Faces Risk as Israel-Iran Conflict Pushes Crude Oil Prices Higher
description: India’s economy is at risk as the Israel-Iran conflict drives crude oil prices up. ICRA warns a fair increase could cost India $13-14 billion in oil imports, widen the CAD, and inflate WPI sharply. The closure threat to the SoH crucial for 50% of India's crude, which could escalate energy costs and ...

title: Indian stock market: Israel-Iran war to India-US trade deal— 5 factors that hold keys to trend reversal on Dalal Street
description:
The Indian stock market has been rangebound for almost a month amid heightened geopolitical tensions, Trump's tariff-related uncertainties and stretched valuations.

While the benchmark Nifty 50 is up about 1 per cent for June so far, it has stayed in the range of 24,470 to 25,200, failing to hold a...

title: The week in charts: Unemployment rises, Boeing totters, Apple's mojo fades
description:
India’s unemployment rate rose to 5.6% in May, with rural areas seeing a sharper rise. The tragic Air India crash has added to Boeing’s struggles amid tough competition from rival Airbus. And the Israel-Iran conflict has caused oil prices to spike.
